questions.question_text: Which open source orchestration tool can be used to provision autonomous database resources in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure?
Which is the correct subset of services offered via OCI-CLI (command line interface) for Autonomous Database (ABD) via calls made to the OCI API's?

discussion.content:
Correct Ans: B
There is nothing like - Query in OCI-CLI commands
B is the correct. (query is not valid)
B is correct. remember that in OCI CLI (or in AWS cli also) - there is no "query" command. teh querying is done by get and list commands.

B is correct.

autonomous-database

questions.question_text: What two methods can you use to define Machine Learning Users? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Correct Answer:A,B and C are okay.
Formally A, B, C. But answer C is incorrect by itself, SQL Developer cannot be run at the same system as ADB.
A,B and C are correct answers.
there are 5 answer options in this question. please remember the correct answer.

this question is missing 1 option : Ans is:-

A. SQL Developer can only export/move/import files using datapump from databases running on Linux systems.
B. SQL Developer can import .csv files into ADB which are located on the system where SQL Developer is running.
C. SQL Developer can be used to export/move/import of a database to ADB in l set of wizard steps.
D. SQL Developer can be started from the ADB Cloud console but only for data loading scenarios.
E. SQL Developer can import files (.dmp and .csv for example) into ADB which are located on Amazon S3 Object storage
Answer: B,C,E

It cannot be B because D says .dmp or data pump files must be local, the cab file would be fine but not the oracle file, it would have to be copied to the oracle object store first then used the answer is. ACD

choices.C: SQL Developer can import .csv files into ADB which are located on the system where SQL Developer is running.
choices.A: SQL Developer can be used to export/move/import of a database to ADB in 1 set of wizard steps.
choices.B: SQL Developer can import files (.dmp and .csv for example) into ADB which are located on Amazon S3 Object storage.
choices.D: SQL Developer can only export/move/import files using datapump from databases running on Linux systems.

questions.question_text:
Migrating an on-premise database to Autonomous Database (ADB) for large amounts of data involves multiple steps like creating a credential object, creating
(access to) a storage object/location, running datapump export and running a datapump import.
Which three statements are true for SQL Developer (18.3 and up) in combination with ADB Data Loading? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
A : 
JDBC Thin Connections with an HTTP Proxy
If the client is behind a firewall and your network configuration requires an HTTP proxy to connect to the internet, you need to use the JDBC Thin Client 18.1 or higher which enables connections through HTTP proxies.
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-data-warehouse-cloud/user/connect-jdbc-thin-wallet.html#GUID-D583E056-CB47-4860-B303-039DEDEC49B8

questions.question_text:
Which Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) thin client version supports the use of HTTP proxy settings that does NOT support TCP to connect to Autonomous
Data Warehouse?
